page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: Type of {Farming}in the area. ------------------------------------ There are six farms in the area. They specialize in growing cereals, potatoes and sugar beet. {Cereals } include wheat,barley,oats and oilseed rape.(used for margarine @cooking oil) An average 400-500{acre}farm can be managed by 4 people.The fields are larger than in the past,inorder to cater for larger time-saving machines. The fields have also been drained. The farms have a {machine }for every job.They include potato planters and harvesters,seed drills,rollers, fertilizer spreaders and the combine harvester(this cuts @ threshes the cereals).The fork lift truck is a useful{machine.}It can load corn,lift bales and clean the crew yard. ------------------------------------
